mapper.sql: SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WFUSERGROUPDETAILID, t1.WFUSERGROUPDETAILNAME, t1.WFUSERGROUPID, t11.WFUSERGROUPNAME, t1.WFUSERID, t21.WFUSERNAME FROM T_SRFWFUSERGROUPDETAIL t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFWFUSERGROUP t11 ON t1.WFUSERGROUPID = t11.WFUSERGROUPID LEFT JOIN T_SRFWFUSER t21 ON t1.WFUSERID = t21.WFUSERID

SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`MEMO`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN`, t1.`WFUSERGROUPDETAILID`, t1.`WFUSERGROUPDETAILNAME`, t1.`WFUSERGROUPID`, t11.`WFUSERGROUPNAME`, t1.`WFUSERID`, t21.`WFUSERNAME` FROM `T_WFUSERGROUPDETAIL` t1 LEFT JOIN T_WFUSERGROUP t11 ON t1.WFUSERGROUPID = t11.WFUSERGROUPID LEFT JOIN T_WFUSER t21 ON t1.WFUSERID = t21.WFUSERID

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WFUSERGROUPDETAILID, t1.WFUSERGROUPDETAILNAME, t1.WFUSERGROUPID, t11.WFUSERGROUPNAME, t1.WFUSERID, t21.WFUSERNAME FROM T_WFUSERGROUPDETAIL t1 LEFT JOIN T_WFUSERGROUP t11 ON t1.WFUSERGROUPID = t11.WFUSERGROUPID LEFT JOIN T_WFUSER t21 ON t1.WFUSERID = t21.WFUSERID

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WFUSERGROUPDETAILID, t1.WFUSERGROUPDETAILNAME, t1.WFUSERGROUPID, t11.WFUSERGROUPNAME, t1.WFUSERID, t21.WFUSERNAME FROM T_SRFWFUSERGROUPDETAIL t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFWFUSERGROUP t11 ON t1.WFUSERGROUPID = t11.WFUSERGROUPID LEFT JOIN T_SRFWFUSER t21 ON t1.WFUSERID = t21.WFUSERID

SELECT t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[MEMO], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN], t1.[WFUSERGROUPDETAILID], t1.[WFUSERGROUPDETAILNAME], t1.[WFUSERGROUPID], t11.[WFUSERGROUPNAME], t1.[WFUSERID], t21.[WFUSERNAME] FROM [T_SRFWFUSERGROUPDETAIL] t1 LEFT JOIN T_SRFWFUSERGROUP t11 ON t1.WFUSERGROUPID = t11.WFUSERGROUPID LEFT JOIN T_SRFWFUSER t21 ON t1.WFUSERID = t21.WFUSERID
